title: iPad (3rd generation)
summary: The iPad (3rd generation)[4] (marketed as The new iPad,[5] colloquially referred to as the iPad 3)[6][7][8] is a tablet computer, developed and marketed by Apple Inc. The third device in the iPad line of tablets, it added a Retina Display, the new Apple A5X chip with a quad-core graphics processor, a 5-megapixel camera, HD 1080p video recording, voice dictation, and support for LTE networks in North America.[9] It shipped with iOS 5, which also provides a platform for audio-visual media, including electronic books, periodicals, films, music, computer games, presentations and web browsing.[3]
